text: My daughter loves learning to play piano from Teacher Chelsea. She is very friendly and patient to teach her. What I also like about them is that the teacher will share with us about her progress after each lesson. The Studio at Bukit Merah is not huge but very nicely maintained.

Chanced upon the new Melodious Piano Studio at Bukit Merah as itâ€™s very near to my place. Its a small studio but looks bright and nice decor. The teachers are very friendly and warm. My son loves the class and wanted to go back every day instead of weekly. Teacher Miao Jun is patient and gentle with him and will give feedback (video) after each lesson. Even though he just joined for about a month, he got to participate in a mini performance with the rest of the students. Definitely recommended.
I send my 4 year old for piano class. Teacher Miao Jun is very patient and the teaching style is very suitable for young children. My daughter has improved a lot in attention span during her lessons.

My girl just attended 2nd lesson with Teacher Chelsea and she is still enjoying it. Though she is still very shy, Ms Chelsea is patient and attentive to her. Looking forward to learning new songs with teacher!
Very patient teacher and lesson plans, my boy managed to learn well there and developed interests in playing the piano.
